name: Progeny
description:
This is an HTML game designed around appealing and appeasing women whose primary function is mass producing super soldiers for a war effort. 

Sounds like there's hyper preg in this game and there is a bit of it (as well as sex) but it's not like a visual novel where the focus is on romancing it's more like a text based management game where random events and stats dictate what happens on a page by page basis. 

I was partially inspired by the HTML games that had much better writing but didn't have a real gameplay method that wasn't trial and error with a linear path to success but the real inspiration was Hall Runner from Homestarrunner and Milton Bradly's Dark Tower. Should become obvious when the situation presents itself so hopefully you enjoy it.
